prompt: What are the best project management tools for small teams?

response.answerText: Based on the latest information, here are the top project management tools for small teams: 1. **Asana** - Excellent for task management and team collaboration. 2. **Trello** - Simple kanban boards perfect for small teams. 3. **Monday.com** - Highly customizable with great automation features. 4. **Notion** - All-in-one workspace with project management capabilities. 5. **ClickUp** - Feature-rich with time tracking and reporting.

mentions.snippet: Excellent for task management and team collaboration
Simple kanban boards perfect for small teams
Highly customizable with great automation features
All-in-one workspace with project management capabilities
Feature-rich with time tracking and reporting
